page.title: 06WAITROSE
page.content:
Waitrose opens at 6.00 a.m. when the cleaners start they finish at 8.00 am The goods are delivered to the store by the back door into the loading bay. Then they are taken in the lift to the warehouse where they are priced and taken to the shop floor to be sold. In the warehouse there are two freezers,one for keeping all the yoghurts and drinks in and the other is for keeping frozen foods like peas and chips in. Waitrose has 120 workers but many of them work part_time.The store has a board to show which part of the store sells the most. This was how they made it this week.
Main group Â£78,142 : Wines Â£8,473 Fruit & veg Â£14,629 : Meat Â£13,516 Total Â£114,760
